FROM openwhisk/nodejs6action

RUN apt-get update \
  && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y git \
  && npm install --save simple-git js-yaml && npm cache clean --force; && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

COPY wskdeploy /nodejsAction/
